headline: UK GOV 'TOO LITTLE, TOO LATE' 😩⏳💀 – Boris & BoJo Clowns 🤡🇬🇧 Cost 23K LIVES in COVID WAVE 1, LOCKDOWN COULD'VE BEEN AVOIDED Like a BAD SEQUEL 🎥🚫!
text:
UK GOV SNOOZED 😴🛌 on COVID ALARM 🚨🦠 like PARTYBOY BORIS JOHNSON 🎉🍻 at a RAVE, dropping 'TOO LITTLE, TOO LATE' BOMBSHELL 💣📜 from Baroness Hallett's INQUIRY 🔥👩‍⚖️! First wave in England? 23K EXTRA SOULS 💀😢 shipped to the AFTERLIFE 🚀☠️ cuz ministers WAITED A WEEK ⏳🍔 to SLAM LOCKDOWN on March 23, 2020 – that's 48% FEWER DEATHS 📉💀 if they'd HUSTLED EARLIER like SPEEDY GONZALES 🐭💨! VOLUNTARY VIBES 😷🏠 like social distancing and iso-quarantine BEFORE March 16 could've DODGED LOCKDOWN DRAMA 🎭🚫 altogether, but NOPE, CHAOTIC DOWNING STREET CIRCUS 🤹‍♂️🎪 turned it into a CLUSTERF*CK 💥🤦‍♂️!

Hallett SPILLING TEA ☕👑: 'ALL FOUR GOVS 🇬🇧🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿🇮🇪 failed to CLOCK the THREAT SCALE 🦠📈 or URGENCY 🚀!' Scientists SIMPED HARD 🤓💦 for HERD IMMUNITY 🐑🛡️, saying 'WAIT TILL PEAK 📈😱 to RESTRICT' – MISLEADING ASSURANCES 🐂💩 had 'em THINKING UK was PREPPED like BATMAN 🦇🛡️! Nearly 800 PAGES 📚💸 of FAILS: LOCKDOWNS SAVED LIVES 🦸‍♂️💉 but SCARRED KIDS' CHILDHOODS 🧒😭, DELAYED CANCER TX 🎗️⏳, and BOOSTED INEQUALITIES 📈😤 like a BAD HANDOUT 🍑🚫!

BUT PRAISE DROP 🥇✨ for VAX ROLLOUT 'REMARKABLE' 💉🚀 – exited 2021 lockdown like PROS 🏆, jabbing VULNERABLE GRANNIES 👵💪 first, TURNING POINT 🌀🔥! Total PANDEMIC TALLY? 227K UK DEATHS ☠️🇬🇧 by 2023, but NOPE, can't say it'd be LOWER cuz CHAOS FACTORS 🌀🤷‍♂️! RECS GALORE 📝🔧 for NEXT TIME, but BEREAVED FAMILIES 😢💔 via Deborah Doyle ROASTING: 'BORIS PUT POLLS OVER PEOPLE 🤡📊, our LOVED ONES STILL KICKIN' if not for BoJo's BUM LEADERSHIP 🍑💥!' Johnson GHOSTING 👻📵, no response YET!

CUMMINGS 👨‍💼🐍, Boris's EX-BRO 🚫👫, BLASTS INQUIRY as 'COVER-UP CORRUPTION' 🕵️‍♂️🤥 on X (fka Twitter 🐦💸): 'EXPERTS SAID DO NOTHING 😏🚫, HERD IMMUNITY BY SEPT 🐑📅!' Keir Starmer 🇬🇧🧔 CHILLIN': 'We'll CONSIDER 📖🤔, NHS STILL HURTIN' 😷🏥, PANDEMIC BILL HEAVY 💰📉!' Lib Dem Ed Davey DEMANDS Kemi Badenoch APOLOGIZE 🙏😤 for TORY TRAINWRECK 🚂💥 – 'SHATTERING NEWS 🥺💔, NEVER AGAIN!'

SCOTS Nicola Sturgeon 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿👩‍💼: 'MISTAKES INEVITABLE 🤷‍♀️🌀 in UNPRECEDENTED PANIC!' NI's Michelle O'Neill 🇮🇪💪: 'WELCOME MILESTONE 🏅, LESSONS LOCKED IN 🔒📚!' Welsh Eluned Morgan & Mark Drakeford 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 DEFENDIN': 'DID OUR BEST 🫡📈!' UK GOVS ALL ROASTED 🔥🍖 for PLANNING FUMBLES 🤦‍♀️🗺️ – LESSON? DON'T SNOOZE ON PLAGUES 😴🦠 or it's 23K REGRETS FOREVER ⏳💀‼️
